history.proof: intros A x xs. induction xs as [|y xs']. - apply head_insertion. - qsimpl time: 1 use: tail_insertion.

exceptions.tactic: apply (tail_insertion A x y xs' IHxs').
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set x, y : A xs' : list A IHxs' : insertion A x xs' (xs' ++ x :: nil) The term "IHxs'" has type "insertion A x xs' (xs' ++ x :: nil)" while it is expected to have type "list A".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (A : Set) (x : A) (xs : list A), insertion A x xs (xs ++ x :: nil)

Premises:
insertion : forall A : Set, A -> list A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.N
head_insertion : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l : list A), insertion A x l (x :: l)
tail_insertion : forall (A : Set) (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> insertion A x (y :: l) (y :: l')
Relation_Operators.d_conc : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)
insertion_sind : forall (A : Set) (P : A -> list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x l (x :: l)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> P x l l' -> P x (y :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (y : A) (l l0 : list A), insertion A y l l0 -> P y l l0
insertion_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : A -> list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x l (x :: l)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> P x l l' -> P x (y :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (y : A) (l l0 : list A), insertion A y l l0 -> P y l l0
Permutation_cons_append : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (x : A), Permutation (x :: l) (l ++ x :: nil)
Relation_Operators.Desc_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Relation_Operators.Desc_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Inductive Desc (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := d_nil : Relation_Operators.Desc A leA nil | d_one : forall x : A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (x :: nil) | d_conc : forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil) Arguments Relation_Operators.Desc _%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_one _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_conc _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _%list_scope
Relation_Operators.d_one : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (x : A), Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (x :: nil)
concat_cons : forall (A : Type) (x : list A) (l : list (list A)), concat (x :: l) = x ++ concat l
in_split : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), In x l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ x :: l2
app_cons_not_nil : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), nil <> x ++ a :: y
app_comm_cons : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), a :: x ++ y = (a :: x) ++ y
Permutation_nil_app_cons : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (x : A), ~ Permutation nil (l ++ x :: l')
nil_cons : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), nil <> x :: l
app_inj_tail : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a b : A), x ++ a :: nil = y ++ b :: nil -> x = y /\ a = b
Relation_Operators.Ltl_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Relation_Operators.Ltl_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
perm_swap : forall (A : Type) (x y : A) (l : list A), Permutation (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)
Exists_cons_hd : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Exists P (x :: l)
Relation_Operators.Lt_nil : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (a : A) (x : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA nil (a :: x)
rev_app_distr : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A), rev (x ++ y) = rev y ++ rev x
rev_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (l ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, P l
app_eq_unit : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), x ++ y = a :: nil -> x = nil /\ y = a :: nil \/ x = a :: nil /\ y = nil
rev_unit : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (a : A), rev (l ++ a :: nil) = a :: rev l
Forall_cons : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> Forall P (x :: l)
Add_cons : forall (A : Type) (a x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> Add a (x :: l) (x :: l')
Inductive Ltl (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Lt_nil : forall (a : A) (x : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA nil (a :: x) | Lt_hd : forall a b : A, leA a b ->...-> Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA (a :: x) (a :: y) Arguments Relation_Operators.Ltl _%type_scope _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_hd _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_tl _%type_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope
Forall2_cons : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l')

```coq
intros A x xs.
induction xs as [|y xs'].
- apply head_insertion.
- apply (tail_insertion A x y xs' IHxs').
Qed.```
